name: Sputnik Eyes
summary:
Sputnik Eyes is a puzzle game that will take you on a journey across space. 
 
Help the little Eyes to scan and explore each planet on the way. The objective is clear, the paths to reach it entwined. Use your logical thinking and help each of your robotic companions to reach its right-colored position – only then you can analyze a planet. But the positions are only reachable by a few paths.....
